title: The Favorites - AFC & NFC North Betting Previews
itunes:title: The Favorites - AFC & NFC North Betting Previews
description:
Our exhaustive division-by-division NFL betting previews begins at the top of the map, as Action Network's Chad Millman and Simon Hunter welcome back their colleague Chris Raybon to discuss the AFC and NFC North. Are the Ravens a team to fade at current prices? Are the Steelers a team ready to surprise? And is a new coach just the answer the Minnesota Vikings have been waiting for? All this and so much more, plus a clip from America's most treasured film: Con Air. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
